name: PhotoHand
overview:
PhotoHand.com is an online photo improvement and photo design factory that makes these services easily accessible and affordable to every mom, newlywed, serial dater, actor, musician, aspiring model, pageant contestant, starting out fashion designer, beauty professional, life coach… everyone. It all starts with photo retouching at $3.50 (professional and amateur photos are welcome) and then PhotoHand creates celebrity style photo books with cinematic layouts, promotional and greeting cards, model portfolios and headshots.

Traditional photo retouching services are not geared towards small customers: they are overpriced, use a cumbersome ordering process by email or through FTP, and require preliminary estimates based on $$/hr.

PhotoHand.com resolves these problems through transparent productized pricing, shopping cart for orders, online proofing and download, immediate order status visibility and low price due to efficiency.

Resulting benefits to customers: faster turnaround, reliable automated communication, error-proof order tracking and unbeatable pricing.

Resulting benefits to PhotoHand: scalability and access to a wide customer base internationally as well as higher profit margins due to low overhead.
